headline.main: CHINESE REPORT GAINS; Japanese Said to Have Suffered 'Immense Casualties'

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, May 1 (U.P.) -- A Chinese communique today reported a heavy attack by Chinese forces on the railway city of Anyang, near the Honan border, and severe fighting on both slopes of the Taihang mountain range on the Honan-Shansi border, in which the Japanese suffered "immense casualties."
abstract: China battles: Chinese attack Anyang; severe fighting with heavy Jap losses reptd on both slopes of Taiheng Mts; Japanese rept 46 US planes destroyed by Jap raiders on and above Yunnanyi airdrome
